Calamity_Castle - Estate.Name
 
capacity - Variable in class Estate
The number of inner EstateSquares in the Estate and hence how the maximum number of Cards from its contents that can be displayed.

Computer - Class in <Unnamed>
Computer is a subclass of Player describing an autonomous Player.

configureEstateSquares() - Method in class Board
Configures all EstateSquares by determining if they are on the inside or outside, and which Square is directly outside if it is an entrance.
